name: My Apples!
description:
CONTROLS
A, D = Move to the sides
W = Climb the ladders
S = Drop to platform below
MOUSE RIGHT CLICK = Shoot
----------------------------------------------
This is your Gameboy experience! If you had one, you may remember that battery light warning us when you should change the batteries.

Well, in this game you have to recharge your batteries, so you can keep playing.
Also you have to protect your apples from those hungry bugs!

Please, leave a comment. Your feedback is very important =)

(game in Early Access. Soon I'll upload an updated version with music and SFX)
